query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT usucod, usucla, usuact, usunom FROM epsusu WHERE usucod = @usucod AND usucla = @usucla

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT oppide, oppcon, opphis, oppori, oppfec, oppest, oppusu FROM epsopp WHERE opphis = @opphis

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT proide, procon, proori FROM epspro WHERE proide = @proide

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT medide, meddos, meduni, medfre, meddur, medpos, medobs, medcod FROM epsmed WHERE medide = @medide

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT matide, matpre, matcan, matobs, matcod FROM epsmat WHERE matide = @matide

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT labide, labcan, labfre, labobs, labcod FROM epslab WHERE labide = @labide

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT pachis, pacide, pactid, pacnom, pacno2, pacap1, pacap2, pacsex, pacnac FROM epspac WHERE pachis = @pachis
